OOC: are Blacknightmare and Chaostaur in the same room?

Blacknightmare::

Blacknightmare was still sat down and thinking a lot things. She 
would have wished to know what would happen with her.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Chaostaur::
>        He blinks, gradually waking up.  "Ugh, that probably wasn't 
my 
> smartest move.  So who can I kill?"  He looks around in a bit of a 
daze.
